body.name: V VCOM RGB Gaming Headphones Stand with 2 USB Ports Headset Stand with 10 Light Modes and Non-Slip Rubber, Suitable for All Earphone Accessories, Best Gift for Husband, Kids, Boyfriend

features: 【Controller Holder & Headset Stand】All universal models can be perfectly stored or displayed. It can hold 1 headphone and 2 controllers at the same time, or 4 game controllers. Excellent stable and flexible, it not only a stand but also a beautiful storage product to save your desk space.

【10 RGB Lighting Mode】VCOM headset stand has 10 light effect modes. These include 2 color cycle modes, 1 breathing mode and 7 static single color modes. The single color light mode including red ,green, blue, purple, cyan, yellow, white. The light is evenly distributed, and the color of the base and lamp will shift together as the light effect is switched.

【 2 USB ports 】 Plug and play, no driver required. The RGB game stand has 2 USB ports. The port with a USB sign is a USB 2.0 port that can be used for charging(5W) and data transmission(480 Mbps). Perfects for mouse, keyboard, smartphones or USB drive. The other USB port can only charge your device 5W (5V1A).

【With Memory Feature】Upgraded RGB headset holder with memory feature. The headset stand will not be initialized and will remember the color mode before closing. Tap for 3s to turn on/off the light. By touching the button to change the color mode, you can choose lighting modes in different scenes.

【Easy Installation & More Stable】Just assemble 3 parts together in 30 seconds, then you can get a stylish and beautiful headphone holder. Headset stand RGB adds iron to the headset stand base, and stands more stably on the desktop, With 4 non-slip rubber bases, providing good stability and wear resistance. The soft protective rubber of holder prevents scratches or damage your devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: V VCOM RGB Gaming Headphones Stand with 10 Light Modes

Gaming Headset Stand Are you still troubled by the poor placement of the earphones? V VCOM RGB Gaming Headphones Stand with 10 Light Modes can not only solve the problem, but also its color mode can better create the game atmosphere, allowing you to better experience the fun of the game. Are you still worrying about choosing gifts for your friends and family? Don't hesitate, this V VCOM headphone stand light is a great choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this. Though the light on it is SUPER bright like lights up my whole area in the night. It holds my controller and my headset perfectly. Definity worth what I paid for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: RGB lighting is a great addition you can add anywhere. I've tried many things for my controllers and headphones, but they always end up on the ground. This has four spots for controllers and headphones. You will have to even out the weight, you can't put very heavy things by themselves on one side, but the holders have nice rubberized grips for protection. Has a few different modes of lighting and many solid colors to choose from.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great gift. The LED lights are fun and the stand is sturdy. Stepson approved!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We went through a ton of these, this one's one of my favorites the lighting on it is extremely cool. Once again can't beat it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for a light/controller and headphone stand, but feels flimsy and hard to control
reviews.reviewText: The premise behind this light/stand is great, but it’s so badly made.There’s no instructions for assembly or operation.I felt like I was going to break it putting it together.There are no lights to indicate if it has power or anything.It has one ‘touch spot’ that operates everything.And it will randomly turn on depending on the USB port you’re using to power it.I like the design, but it needs better materials, controls, and information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful, and can hold multiple accessories
reviews.reviewText: I got this item to help minimize the clutter on my desk. I use it for 3 headsets, 2 of them are resting on the top plastic holder, and the 3rd is resting on top of those two headsets which is more than it is designed for, but it works and looks fine. I am reviewing this on my LIveStream, and one of my viewers said that the RGB makes it look cheap, which I agree with but I leave it on pink and I like it. I use the bottom mounts for two controllers I use most often. The one complain I have, is that the bottom isn't weighted and so if there are only things being mounted on the top, it will fall over. The materials are plastic all around. The mount has two USB ports, I plugged in a USB C cable and a USB micro cable for versatility. Overall, I think it works well because it is condensed and saves alot of space and will charge your devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Box wasnt in good condition and it was a gift
reviews.reviewText: Product itself came in good condition but the box cover tha came wasnt in good condition wich is a bummer because it was a gift for someone. It looks like it has been opened before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty decent headphone stand
reviews.reviewText: I chose this product in particular because it had 4 different hooks and could simultaneously hold a variety of different things including game controllers. The 4 hooks give me the ability to place up to 4 gaming controller, or 2 controllers along with a pair of headphones, making it the perfect product for anyone who has a desk gaming setup. The base seems pretty solid and the RGB lights look amazing, especially at night when it's dark. I did feel as though the rod seemed a little less sturdy then the base, and the connection inside was a little difficult for me to put through since the wire was a little long and kept getting in the way, but it's a small problem in an otherwise awesome product. It also has two USB ports so you can charge something or plug in another accessory.Pros:- Awesome RGB lights with multiple efffects- Contains 2 USB Slots to plug in other accessories- Freedom to hold either 4 controllers, or 2 controllers + headphonesCons:- Wire took a few minutes for me to plug in since it was really long and kept getting in the way- The RGB pole seemed a little flimsy compared to the solid base.Overall, a fantastic product for anyones desk gaming setup.
